ComicInfo.Summary: After defeating the four horsemen, Deathblow and his allies turn their attentions toward saving Christopher from the Black Angel. Michael realizes how to repair the Sword of Heaven and uses the weapon to dispatch the Black Angel for good. Christopher heals Deathblow of his wounds and is taken to Heaven by angels. Michael buries his ex-wife.
